name: Killjoys
description:
Killjoys follows a fun-loving, hard living trio of interplanetary bounty hunters sworn to remain impartial as they chase deadly warrants throughout the Quad, a distant system on the brink of a bloody, multiplanetary class war.
Hunt down warrant targets as you blast your way through the streets of Old Town. Gain joy buy boosts and do not let anyone, or anything, get in your way - The Warrant Is All.

Features:

- Fast-paced bullet combat in a retro-inspired environment
- Dynamic mission assignment gives you new objectives and gameplay on the fly
- Level up and unlock new warrants for brand-new gameplay!
- Use powerful boosts to blast away your enemies: from spider bombs to air support!
